FOUND IN: Smugness (a smug attitude implies self-satisfaction but with a negative tone)

CLUE: Decisions of courts on issues of fact or law

FOUND IN: Toltecs (later than pre-Aztec civilizations, often considered precursomed by Aztecs)
Poleon (a play on the word "Polish" with a reference to Warsaw)
Black plum (also known as black cherry, but the skin is often a deeper red)
